title: Tesla To Invest $2 Billion In Elon Musk's xAI
description: Tesla will invest approximately $2 billion into CEO Elon Musk's artificial intelligence startup, xAI.
content:
Tesla, Inc. (NASDAQ:TSLA) disclosed in its fourth-quarter earnings release that it will invest approximately $2 billion into CEO Elon Musk's artificial intelligence startup, xAI.
TSLA stock is climbing. See the chart and details here.

title: Asteroid that wiped out dinosaurs had limited impact on sharks and rays, study shows
description: A new study using advanced artificial intelligence (AI) has revealed that the asteroid strike that wiped out the dinosaurs 66 million years ago caused only a modest decline in shark and ray species. The findings, published in the journal Current Biology, challenge previous understandings of how severely this mass extinction affected life in the oceans.

title: Exclusive: Nvidia helped DeepSeek hone AI models later used by China's military, lawmaker says
description: U.S. chipmaker Nvidia helped China's DeepSeek hone artificial intelligence models that were later used by the Chinese military, the chairman of a U.S. House of Representatives committee said in a letter seen by Reuters on Wednesday.
content: DeepSeek shook markets early last year with a set of AI models that rivaled some of the best offerings from the United States but were developed with far less computing power, fuelling concerns in Washington that China could catch up with the U.S. in... [3012 chars]

title: Elon Musk's Tesla to invest $2B in xAI as EV maker's revenue, profit slump
description: Tesla said Wednesday it had agreed to invest about $2 billion in Elon Musk's artificial intelligence startup xAI, deepening ties between the companies as the automaker pitches itself as an autonomy and robotics-driven company.
content:

title: Tesla to invest $2 billion in xAI, Elon Musk's OpenAI competitor
description: In its earnings report on Wednesday, Tesla said it invested $2 billion in xAI, Elon Musk's artificial intelligence startup.
content:
Tesla said on Wednesday that it's agreed to invest $2 billion into Elon Musk's xAI, which he launched almost three years ago as a prospective competitor to OpenAI.

title: Tesla Gears Up for AI Future with Major xAI Investment
description: Tesla announced a $2 billion investment in xAI, aligning with CEO Elon Musk's focus on artificial intelligence. The company affirmed its production schedule for Cybercab robotaxi and Semi trucks. Despite facing competitive pressure, Tesla maintains strong financial performance, driven by a strategic push into self-driving technology.
content: Tesla is making a bold $2 billion investment in xAI, the artificial intelligence company led by CEO Elon Musk, as it pivots further from its roots as an electric vehicle maker. The strategic move aims to strengthen Tesla's position in the autonomous ... [788 chars]

title: Meta Forecasts Spending of at Least $115 Billion This Year
description: That would be a major jump from the $72 billion that the Silicon Valley tech giant shelled out last year, as it aims to compete in the artificial intelligence race.
content:
To stay competitive in the artificial intelligence race, Meta increased its spending on data centers last year and began shifting away from virtual reality.
On Wednesday, the company said it would bet even bigger this year.

title: ServiceNow (NOW) Gives Outlook That Fails to Ease AI Disruption Fears
description: ServiceNow Inc. gave a sales outlook in the current quarter that was stronger than expected, but failed to reduce investor anxieties that artificial intelligence will disrupt the software maker’s business.
